kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
We support categories for [builder properties using UI Form Components](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-form-components/editing-components#group-components-into-categories) _and_ custom object type field definitions but not for content type field definitions (as of Xperience v30.3.0).
The reusable field schema example you shared _might_ be using the "Text with Label" form component for the first schema field. The "Text with Label" component displays the field value as text (could be an empty string). Then you can display the label as HTML and design it however you want.
